description:
Greek God of Wine and Merrymaking. Dionysus is a charming flirt with a happy-go-lucky personality, even though he doesn`t like to be told what to do. He is said to be warm but slightly crazy. He is sometimes seen appreciating wine. He seems to know a lot about the matters of love.
He is said to be the brother of Apollon and Hades nephew.
Source. en.wikipedia
name: Dionysus Thyrsos
